interface.name: sword.military.knowledge.Motile
interface.description: Represente tout élément capable de se déplacer par ses propres moyens (les unités).

method.name: canBeFollowed
method.description: Returns "true" if this element can be followed by the agent, 'false' otherwise.

method.name: isMoving
method.description: Returns 'true' if this element is moving, 'false' otherwise.
